content: various different crocheted drops flowers drops extra 0-118 yarn we used following colors nr 1 light blue nr 5 light pink nr 61 golden beige 19 silver grey drops muskat from garnstudio crochet hook size 3 mm \ us d/3 patterns * silver grey flower with round bows and leaves in 2 layers * golden beige flower with wheel in center round bows and leaves in 2 layers * light pink flower with wheel in center pointed bows and leaves in 3 layers * light blue starflower * light blue chainflower * silver grey chainflower * leaf uk version 1 1 http //www garnstudio com/pattern php id=2418&cid=19
